title.rendered: New Video Play Mode & Video Libraries Inside 360Player

content.rendered:
[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.22.3″ max_width_tablet=”” max_width_phone=”” max_width_last_edited=”on|desktop” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”0|0px|3px|0px|false|false” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” da_is_popup=”off” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”0px|||||”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.7.7″ text_font=”|600|||||||” text_text_color=”#151516″ text_orientation=”center” max_width=”80%” max_width_tablet=”” max_width_phone=”” max_width_last_edited=”on|desktop” module_alignment=”center” hover_enabled=”0″ sticky_enabled=”0″]

Check out the new features inside of 360Player as we come to the end of 2020 and into Q1 of 2021. New features include a new video play mode, video libraries, a new staff role, and more!

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_video src=”https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EToURU7YIVc” _builder_version=”4.7.7″ _module_preset=”default” max_width=”80%” module_alignment=”center”][/et_pb_video][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.7.7″ text_font=”|600|||||||” text_text_color=”#151516″ text_orientation=”center” max_width=”70%” max_width_tablet=”” max_width_phone=”” max_width_last_edited=”on|desktop” module_alignment=”center” hover_enabled=”0″ sticky_enabled=”0″]

Video Play Mode

Our video analytics tool now has a video play mode featuring a larger screen for a more optimal viewing experience. To go into the video editor mode to create clips and analyze video, simply press create clips in the top right hand corner. Now you can showcase highlights and clips for your team with more focus on the action and less space being taken up by editing tools in this new playback mode. 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_image src=”https://ts-uploads.azureedge.net/marketing/2020/12/Play-mode-for-video.png” _builder_version=”4.7.7″ _module_preset=”default” title_text=”Play mode for video” hover_enabled=”0″ sticky_enabled=”0″][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_image src=”https://ts-uploads.azureedge.net/marketing/2020/12/Video-Libraries-for-team-and-club.png” _builder_version=”4.7.7″ _module_preset=”default” title_text=”Video Libraries for team and club” hover_enabled=”0″ sticky_enabled=”0″][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.7.7″ text_font=”|600|||||||” text_text_color=”#151516″ text_orientation=”center” max_width=”70%” max_width_tablet=”” max_width_phone=”” max_width_last_edited=”on|desktop” module_alignment=”center” hover_enabled=”0″ sticky_enabled=”0″]

Video Libraries

Coaches loved the fact that they could have separate libraries for their training sessions with personal, team, and club libraries in the session planner tool. Now videos have access to this feature as well! Now it’s easy to share videos with your entire team or club, or have videos in your own personal library just for you.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.7.7″ text_font=”|600|||||||” text_text_color=”#151516″ text_orientation=”center” max_width=”70%” max_width_tablet=”” max_width_phone=”” max_width_last_edited=”on|desktop” module_alignment=”center” hover_enabled=”0″ sticky_enabled=”0″]

Player Profiles Get A New Look

Player profiles got a fresh new look that’s easier to navigate with the tabs above. Easily find what you need with tabs for development information, statistics, video, and more!

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_image src=”https://ts-uploads.azureedge.net/marketing/2020/12/Overview.png” title_text=”Overview” _builder_version=”4.7.7″ _module_preset=”default” module_alignment=”center” max_height=”316px” hover_enabled=”0″ sticky_enabled=”0″][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.7.7″ _module_preset=”default” hover_enabled=”0″ sticky_enabled=”0″][et_pb_column _builder_version=”4.7.7″ _module_preset=”default” type=”4_4″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.7.7″ text_font=”|600|||||||” text_text_color=”#151516″ text_orientation=”center” max_width=”70%” max_width_tablet=”” max_width_phone=”” max_width_last_edited=”on|desktop” module_alignment=”center” hover_enabled=”0″ sticky_enabled=”0″]

Staff Role

We have now added a staff role for coaches and managers of a team who are not administrators. From now on when a new coach joins a team, this will be the default role. Coaches can easily become admins by having an existing admin convert them. Only admins have access to certain team and club settings in the app.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
